div.div:
chris - May 28, 2012 - LGE Bryce with version 5.3.1
Good app
This is a good app. But it doesn't have all the knots, stiches and so on. Other than that its a really good app.

Jeff - November 9, 2011 - Version 5.3.1
Buy twice?
Very useful app. Only problem is I had to buy twice. Had it on iPhone but could not get it on Android without buying again.

Andy - August 22, 2011 - Samsung Infuse 4G with version 5.3.1
Best knot app
Easy to use with step by step illustration using different colored ropes. The only draw back is you have DL each knot when veiwing for the first time.

Matt - January 5, 2012 - Version 5.3.1
Good for Scout Leaders
This app isn't as polished and doesn't have the great detailed descriptions included in the more expensive app, but it has all of the knots required for Scout - First Class. Recommended for scout leaders.

Jim - July 7, 2011 - SEMC Xperia Arc with version 5.3.1
Pritty good, but I now have 504 images in my picture gallery, please fix ...
Pritty good, but I now have 504 images in my picture gallery, please fix for more stars

Keith - December 30, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 5.3.1
Doesn't work on ICS
Apparently doesn't work on my Galaxy Nexus, I'll hit the refund button now.

Caitlin - September 5, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 5.3.1
Use it often
A patient teacher. Great that knots are available offline for download. Great favorites feature.

steve - June 18, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 5.3.1
H T C Sensation 4 G
This is a damm good app. Especially if the knots are necessary, if Ur looking for a certain knot U came to the right place, The instructions R very easy to understand, & the pictures R great

royce - August 18, 2011 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 5.3.1
Download
Has stopped downloading completely, please fix

baris - May 21, 2012 - Version 5.3.1
Had to buy twice.
Other than that, two thumbs up.

Karen - May 13, 2012 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 5.3.1
Good most of the time...
Don't know if it's just my phone, but on decorative knots, the description is so long that I can't actually see the list of knots. Otherwise great app!

Simon - January 1, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 5.3.1
Good clear instructions but doesn't fill the screen of my galaxy note

Bill - November 5, 2011 - Droid Bionic with version 5.3.1
Great resource
Very easy to use. Great photos.

Fuzion302 - June 28, 2012 - Version 5.3.1
Very handy!
This app has been useful on more than occasion. Keep the new knots coming.

Bryan - March 3, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 5.3.1
Bryan
Good for work and forklift drivers, thanks

Mark - July 11, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 5.3.1
Awesome app

george - September 12, 2011 - Motorola Droid II with version 5.3.1
Knot guide

Jason - June 10, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 5.2
Once all knots are downloaded no internet needed. Excellent!

Joe - November 29, 2010 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 5.1
Pleasantly surprised. Great knot selection, clear photos and step-by-step ...
Pleasantly surprised. Great knot selection, clear photos and step-by-step instructions. Especially like option to mark "favorites". Dinc

Andre - November 2, 2010 - Version 5.1
Nice app. Would like to be able top download all images at once so ...
Nice app. Would like to be able top download all images at once so it works when no data connection

Nathan - April 20, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 5.1
Great at demonstrating how to tie knots. So-so at explaining their uses. Get the ...
Great at demonstrating how to tie knots. So-so at explaining their uses. Get the knots guide app alongside this app.

Eric - February 13, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 5.1
This was one of my favorite apps on the iphone, all knots are saved ...
This was one of my favorite apps on the iphone, all knots are saved in the memory, the Droid requires download for each knot making it worthless w/o3G

Tino - April 26, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 5.1
Waste of good money takes a long time to download when fishing with no ...
Waste of good money takes a long time to download when fishing with no mobil connection this is useless

Mike - April 8, 2011 - Version 5.1
Great app. Clear diagrams on how to do knots. But would love to see ...
Great app. Clear diagrams on how to do knots. But would love to see more soft bait knots eg: Bamini twist.

frankysan - November 20, 2010 - HTC Nexus One with version 5.1
Cool app on iPhone. Couldn't get it to run or start on my N1. ...
Cool app on iPhone. Couldn't get it to run or start on my N1. Returned for refund. Too bad.

Torchy - March 3, 2011 - Version 5.1
Re comment by Eric. This downloaded the knot database to SD no problem.

Willeybear - February 15, 2011 - HTC myTouch 3G Slide with version 5.1
Awsome illustrations and walk throughs. Would be nice if the bends that are for ...
Awsome illustrations and walk throughs. Would be nice if the bends that are for different sized ropes were demonstrated with 2 sizes of rope.

xanthinealkaloid - January 19, 2011 - Version 5.1
I enjoyed this app on my palm pre and it looks like I'm going ...
I enjoyed this app on my palm pre and it looks like I'm going to enjoy it on my Epic.

Hank - March 25, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 5.1
Wont let me download the instructions to the knots. Force closes.

Iain - January 10, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 5.1
Ok. Chose to download all images and there are lots missing. It shouldn't be ...
Ok. Chose to download all images and there are lots missing. It shouldn't be this much hassle.

G - February 22, 2011 - Version 5.1
Good.

jeff - March 20, 2011 - Version 5.1
Great skill builder

Eric - March 19, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 5.1
Doesn't run on up to date dinc

Sy - August 22, 2010 - Motorola Droid X with version 5.0
Great app. Bought the full version. No problem using offline. Just be sure to ...
Great app. Bought the full version. No problem using offline. Just be sure to click on each knot before going out of coverage.

Daniel Lee - October 1, 2010 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 5.0
Decent program, but load time sucks. Could be more in depth with maybe some ...
Decent program, but load time sucks. Could be more in depth with maybe some vids.

James - October 16, 2010 - HTC Evo 4G with version 5.0
Great selection. Scout knots listed separately. Very easy to follow. Only wish it ...
Great selection. Scout knots listed separately. Very easy to follow. Only wish it had a real exit and not just back to main screen. Great on HTC Evo.

InfernalByte - August 28, 2010 - HTC Desire with version 5.0
Had this on my iPhone before I saw the light. Some of the knots ...
Had this on my iPhone before I saw the light. Some of the knots are repeated in different sections but this still Gets a 5 star.

Eric - October 18, 2010 - Version 5.0
Wow, this has the Monkey`s Fist knot! Great selection of knots here, and I ...
Wow, this has the Monkey`s Fist knot! Great selection of knots here, and I like the way it color codes the ropes.

Justin - September 9, 2010 - LG Ally with version 5.0
Great app with easy to follow pictures. I'm looking forward to more updates in ...
Great app with easy to follow pictures. I'm looking forward to more updates in the future.

Brian - July 27, 2010 - Motorola Droid 3 with version 5.0
This app really is good for learning to tie a knot.

Thomas - May 3, 2010 - Version 5.0
I thought I'd bought the software complete. Unfortunately each knot must be ...
I thought I'd bought the software complete. Unfortunately each knot must be separately downloaded. Painfully slow. Refunding.

Rynner - August 11, 2010 - HTC Desire with version 5.0
Can't use offline. It downloads the pictures for the knots, but you can't view ...
Can't use offline. It downloads the pictures for the knots, but you can't view them. HTC Desire

george - August 27, 2010 - Version 5.0
It's ok, but quite a few doubles of the same knot(ie, square knot reef ...
It's ok, but quite a few doubles of the same knot(ie, square knot reef knot or cowgirth larks head why???) Work well on moment.

Kevin - June 5, 2010 - Samsung Moment with version 5.0
Great guide; if you open a knot before you venture out it will be ...
Great guide; if you open a knot before you venture out it will be saved to your memory

Robert - July 4, 2010 - HTC Nexus One with version 5.0
Had this for the iPhone and loved it. So glad to see it on ...
Had this for the iPhone and loved it. So glad to see it on Android! Great resource, especially for a Scout.

Officially don't like Buzz!! - June 20, 2010 - Version 5.0
Use this for work, great app! HTC Eris

joshua - October 18, 2010 - Motorola Atrix with version 5.0
No dedicated exit on evo, wish there was a download all button to save ...
No dedicated exit on evo, wish there was a download all button to save time. Great app other than that

Peter - June 24, 2010 - Acer Picasso with version 5.0
Would have given 5 stars if there weren't any missing pictures.

jason - August 11, 2010 - Version 5.0
Works perfectly, easy to understand the pictures. Real handy app. HTC HERO

Hammerwalk - May 6, 2010 - Version 5.0
Would be better if it didn't need network connection, kind of defeats the purpose ...
Would be better if it didn't need network connection, kind of defeats the purpose if you need this out in the woods, say for survival

Oliver - December 18, 2010 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 5.0
Images download to SD card should be hidden from gallery app etc, since they ...
Images download to SD card should be hidden from gallery app etc, since they can't be opened.

veensantmo - May 1, 2010 - Version 5.0
fewer steps per knot than knots guide, but has many, many more knots for ...
fewer steps per knot than knots guide, but has many, many more knots for much cheaper

Andrew - April 3, 2010 - Version 5.0
No idea what Skyler is talking about - the red/blue rope works great - ...
No idea what Skyler is talking about - the red/blue rope works great - easy to differentiate between the ropes. A lot of great fishing knots

Gregory - June 19, 2010 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 5.0
Could use more but still great

RJ - July 19, 2010 - HTC Nexus One with version 5.0
Petty in depth guide to knot making.

John - November 3, 2010 - Motorola Droid X with version 5.0
Yes! You can finally download all the knots!!!

J - June 1, 2010 - Motorola Droid with version 5.0
Good guide. I was impressed that it included the San Diego jam knot, not ...
Good guide. I was impressed that it included the San Diego jam knot, not usually found in other knot books, and essential to offshore fishing.

roger - October 5, 2010 - Version 5.0
Love this app!

Alex - September 26, 2010 - Version 5.0
Perfect for fishing!!!

Possum - July 19, 2010 - HTC Desire HD with version 5.0
Great

div.p: It's worth the price (but not worth more). Well organized and clear step by step instructions.

div.div:
lad - January 11, 2010 - Version 4.0
Great selection of knots and excellent diagrams.
